languages.text: Cтав целью атаки, персонаж автоматически {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклоняется{/g} от нее, после чего эффект снимается
languages.original_text: As long as the wearer has the shrouded effect, when becoming the target of an attack, they automatically {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}. After that the shrouded effect is removed.

traits.locale_text: Cтав целью атаки, персонаж автоматически {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклоняется{/g} от нее, после чего эффект снимается

languages.text: As long as the wearer has the shrouded effect, when becoming the target of an attack, they automatically {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}. After that the shrouded effect is removed.
languages.original_text: Cтав целью атаки, персонаж автоматически {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклоняется{/g} от нее, после чего эффект снимается

traits.locale_text: As long as the wearer has the shrouded effect, when becoming the target of an attack, they automatically {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}. After that the shrouded effect is removed.
As long as the wearer has the shrouded effect, when becoming the target of an attack, they automatically {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}. After that the shrouded effect is removed.
As long as the wearer has the shrouded effect, when becoming the target of an attack, they automatically {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}. After that the shrouded effect is removed.

languages.text: Solange der Träger den Verschleiert-Effekt hat, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}weicht er automatisch aus{/g}, wenn er das Ziel eines Angriffs wird. Danach wird der Verschleiert-Effekt entfernt.
languages.original_text: As long as the wearer has the shrouded effect, when becoming the target of an attack, they automatically {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}. After that the shrouded effect is removed.

traits.locale_text: Solange der Träger den Verschleiert-Effekt hat, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}weicht er automatisch aus{/g}, wenn er das Ziel eines Angriffs wird. Danach wird der Verschleiert-Effekt entfernt.

languages.text: Tant que le porteur est sous l'effet Voile, il {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} automatiquement lorsqu'il est attaqué. L'effet est ensuite retiré.
languages.original_text: As long as the wearer has the shrouded effect, when becoming the target of an attack, they automatically {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}. After that the shrouded effect is removed.

traits.locale_text: Tant que le porteur est sous l'effet Voile, il {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} automatiquement lorsqu'il est attaqué. L'effet est ensuite retiré.

languages.text: 当装备者拥有“阴影遮蔽”效果时，装备者遭到攻击时会自动{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}攻击，之后移除“阴影遮蔽”效果。
languages.original_text: As long as the wearer has the shrouded effect, when becoming the target of an attack, they automatically {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}. After that the shrouded effect is removed.

traits.locale_text: 当装备者拥有“阴影遮蔽”效果时，装备者遭到攻击时会自动{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}攻击，之后移除“阴影遮蔽”效果。

languages.text: Mientras el portador tenga el efecto encubierto, al ser objetivo de un ataque lo {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} automáticamente. Después se elimina el efecto.
languages.original_text: As long as the wearer has the shrouded effect, when becoming the target of an attack, they automatically {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}. After that the shrouded effect is removed.

traits.locale_text: Mientras el portador tenga el efecto encubierto, al ser objetivo de un ataque lo {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} automáticamente. Después se elimina el efecto.

languages.text: ベールの効果が発動中は、攻撃対象になっても自動的に{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}を行う。その後、ベールの効果は解除される。
languages.original_text: As long as the wearer has the shrouded effect, when becoming the target of an attack, they automatically {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}. After that the shrouded effect is removed.

traits.locale_text: ベールの効果が発動中は、攻撃対象になっても自動的に{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}を行う。その後、ベールの効果は解除される。

languages.text: Takan kişi, örtülü etkisinde olduğu sürece bir saldırının hedefi olursa o saldırıdan otomatik olarak {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınır{/g}. Kaçınmanın ardından örtülü etkisi ortadan kalkar.
languages.original_text: As long as the wearer has the shrouded effect, when becoming the target of an attack, they automatically {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}. After that the shrouded effect is removed.
